name: All Us Critters
description:
Gamejam game made for the IGI Pub Jam in April 2017.

Move with the arrow keys. Guide all of you to the light nests. Avoid the dark carnivores. Do it again and again.

Pick difficulty with E, R, T keys on the keyboard.

Let me know if you manage to beat the Torment difficulty.

Good luck! All of you need it.
